title: At what juncture is a misleading planning application required to be resubmitted

content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
My question is with regard to planning application process.
If a planning application was found to have been misleading with respect to the works to be carried out within a Conservation Area, what is the procedure in terms of rectification. At what juncture would a request be made for works to be halted and the application resubmitted?
Yours faithfully,
Dr Deepa Shetty MRCVS
